entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.0°C

Humidity: 74 %

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 4 except plus 1 inland.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this morning then changing to rain at times heavy this afternoon. Snow inland late this afternoon. Local blowing snow inland early this afternoon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm except locally 15 cm inland. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 early this afternoon. High plus 4 except plus 1 inland. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Snow inland early this evening. Fog patches. Amount 20 to 30 mm except 50 mm inland and over higher terrain. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then clearing. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023
